scripts.deploy: npm run setenv && cd .. && sudo firebase deploy
scripts.deployhost: npm run setenv && cd .. && sudo firebase deploy --except functions
scripts.deployfunctions: npm run setenv && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.setenv: test -f .env-strava-config.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat .env-strava-config.json)" || echo "Please add the file env.json before deploy."
